Html:
Hi,

I have about 10 calculations that are made on a table. If the calculation is syntactically correct the calculation takes ca. 0.04 seconds.

If I enter a syntax error, the calculation takes 0.8 seconds.

Any idea where the time is taken or if I can improve the speed of the exception handling?

Thx.

Andrew
I think this may be a general c# issue when throwing an exception and not Ncalc's problem!
